summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Seattle Department of Parks and Recreation; authorizing the execution of a grant agreement with the Seattle Housing Authority (SHA), accepting a $50,000 grant to support and continue teen recreation programs at the Yesler Terrace Community Center, increasing the expenditure allowance authority in the Department's 1997 Budget; and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Parks and Recreation Fund therefor, all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
